sqlMap.select:
SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL
)
ORDER BY PAYTYP,ACCOUNTSEQ,SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '1' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
BENEVTREL = #benEvtRel:VARCHAR#
(
BENEVTREL in
BENEVTREL not in
#benEvtRel[]#
OR TRIM(BENEVTREL) IS NULL )
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '5' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY PAYTYP,ACCOUNTSEQ,SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '6' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# ORDER BY PAYTYP,ACCOUNTSEQ,SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '8' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '7' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APSEQNO = #apSeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND APSEQNO = #apSeqNo:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,ISSUTYP ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '19' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '16' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%' AND CPRNDATE LIKE #cPrnDate:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '16' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '17' AND ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND CPRNDATE = #cPrnDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO

SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = '17' AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE LIKE #payCode:VARCHAR#||'%'
AND 1 = 0
APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR#
PAYSEQNO = #paySeqNo:VARCHAR#
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO
sqlMap.insert: insert into BAPAYRPTACCOUNT ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,PROCTIME ,ISSUTYP ,ACCOUNTMEMO ,OPPACCOUNTNO ,OPPACCOUNTNAME ,ACTTITLEAPCODE ,DATACD ,DECIDEAMT ,CASHAMT ,CUTAMT ,ACCEPTPAYTYPE ,CNT ,ACCOUNTTOPFMK ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#benEvtRel:VARCHAR# ,#accountSeq:NUMERIC# ,#seqNo:NUMERIC# ,#accountNo:VARCHAR# ,#accountName:VARCHAR# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' , to_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#accountMemo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountNo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountName:VARCHAR# ,#actTitleApCode:VARCHAR# ,#dataCd:VARCHAR# ,#decideAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cashAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cutAmt:NUMERIC# ,#acceptPayType:VARCHAR# ,#cnt:NUMERIC# ,#accountTopfMk:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#apSeqNo:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTACCOUNT ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,PROCTIME ,ISSUTYP ,ACCOUNTMEMO ,OPPACCOUNTNO ,OPPACCOUNTNAME ,ACTTITLEAPCODE ,DATACD ,DECIDEAMT ,CASHAMT ,CUTAMT ,ACCEPTPAYTYPE ,CNT ,ACCOUNTTOPFMK ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#benEvtRel:VARCHAR# ,#accountSeq:NUMERIC# ,#seqNo:NUMERIC# ,#accountNo:VARCHAR# ,#accountName:VARCHAR# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' , to_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,'N' ,#oppAccountNo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountName:VARCHAR# ,#actTitleApCode:VARCHAR# ,#dataCd:VARCHAR# ,#decideAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cashAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cutAmt:NUMERIC# ,#acceptPayType:VARCHAR# ,#cnt:NUMERIC# ,#accountTopfMk:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#apSeqNo:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTACCOUNT ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,PROCTIME ,ISSUTYP ,ACCOUNTMEMO ,OPPACCOUNTNO ,OPPACCOUNTNAME ,ACTTITLEAPCODE ,DATACD ,DECIDEAMT ,CASHAMT ,CUTAMT ,ACCEPTPAYTYPE ,CNT ,ACCOUNTTOPFMK ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#benEvtRel:VARCHAR# ,#accountSeq:NUMERIC# ,#seqNo:NUMERIC# ,#accountNo:VARCHAR# ,#accountName:VARCHAR# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' , to_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#accountMemo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountNo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountName:VARCHAR# ,#actTitleApCode:VARCHAR# ,#dataCd:VARCHAR# ,#decideAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cashAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cutAmt:NUMERIC# ,#acceptPayType:VARCHAR# ,#cnt:NUMERIC# ,#accountTopfMk:VARCHAR# ,#nlWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#adWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#naChgMk:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#apSeqNo:VARCHAR# )

insert into BAPAYRPTACCOUNT ( RPTTYP ,CPRNDATE ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,PROCTIME ,ISSUTYP ,ACCOUNTMEMO ,OPPACCOUNTNO ,OPPACCOUNTNAME ,ACTTITLEAPCODE ,DATACD ,DECIDEAMT ,CASHAMT ,CUTAMT ,ACCEPTPAYTYPE ,CNT ,ACCOUNTTOPFMK ,NLWKMK ,ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,STS ,APNO ,APSEQNO ) values ( #rptTyp:VARCHAR# ,#cPrnDate:VARCHAR# ,#payCode:VARCHAR# ,#issuYm:VARCHAR# ,#payTyp:VARCHAR# ,#chkDate:VARCHAR# ,#benEvtRel:VARCHAR# ,#accountSeq:NUMERIC# ,#seqNo:NUMERIC# ,#accountNo:VARCHAR# ,#accountName:VARCHAR# ,#payAmt:NUMERIC# ,'' , to_Char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,#issuTyp:VARCHAR# ,#accountMemo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountNo:VARCHAR# ,#oppAccountName:VARCHAR# ,#actTitleApCode:VARCHAR# ,#dataCd:VARCHAR# ,#decideAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cashAmt:NUMERIC# ,#cutAmt:NUMERIC# ,#acceptPayType:VARCHAR# ,#cnt:NUMERIC# ,#accountTopfMk:VARCHAR# ,#nlWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#adWkMk:VARCHAR# ,#naChgMk:VARCHAR# ,#sts:VARCHAR# ,#apNo:VARCHAR# ,#apSeqNo:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT RPTTYP, PAYCODE, ISSUYM, PAYTYP, CHKDATE, BENEVTREL, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO, ACCOUNTNO, ACCOUNTNAME, PAYAMT, PAYSEQNO, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, '' AS PROCTIME, RPTPAGE, ERPTPAGE FROM (SELECT RPTTYP, PAYCODE, ISSUYM, PAYTYP, CHKDATE, BENEVTREL, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO, ACCOUNTNO, ACCOUNTNAME, SUM(PAYAMT) AS PAYAMT, '' AS PAYSEQNO, '' AS NLWKMK, '' AS ADWKMK, '' AS NACHGMK, 0 AS RPTPAGE, 0 AS ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND ACCOUNTSEQ = 0
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
GROUP BY RPTTYP, PAYCODE, ISSUYM, PAYTYP, CHKDATE, BENEVTREL, ACCOUNTSEQ, SEQNO, ACCOUNTNO, ACCOUNTNAME, PAYSEQNO, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, NACHGMK, RPTPAGE, ERPTPAGE) T1 UNION SELECT RPTTYP ,PAYCODE ,ISSUYM ,PAYTYP ,CHKDATE ,BENEVTREL ,ACCOUNTSEQ ,SEQNO ,ACCOUNTNO ,ACCOUNTNAME ,PAYAMT ,PAYSEQNO ,NVL(TRIM(NLWKMK), '') AS NLWKMK ,NVL(TRIM(ADWKMK), '') AS ADWKMK ,NACHGMK ,PROCTIME ,RPTPAGE ,ERPTPAGE FROM BAPAYRPTACCOUNT WHERE RPTTYP = #rptTyp:VARCHAR# AND PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR#
AND ACCOUNTSEQ <> 0
AND 1 = 0
(
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') = ' '
NVL(TRIM(NACHGMK),' ') != ' '
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NULL
OR TRIM(NACHGMK) IS NOT NULL
)
ORDER BY ACCOUNTSEQ, NACHGMK, NLWKMK, ADWKMK, PAYTYP, SEQNO

select t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' group by t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym order by t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym

select t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym, t.CHKDATE from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' and t.issutyp = 'E' and t.accountmemo = 'N' group by t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym, t.CHKDATE order by t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym

select t.NLWKMK, t.ADWKMK, t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' group by t.NLWKMK,t.ADWKMK,t.RPTTYP,t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym order by t.NLWKMK,t.ADWKMK,t.RPTTYP,t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym

select t.NLWKMK, t.ADWKMK, t.RPTTYP, t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' and t.NACHGMK is null group by t.NLWKMK,t.ADWKMK,t.RPTTYP,t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym order by t.NLWKMK,t.ADWKMK,t.RPTTYP,t.ISSUTYP, t.paycode, t.paytyp, t.issuym

select t.RPTTYP, t.PAYCODE, t.ISSUYM, t.CHKDATE, deCode(t.ACCOUNTSEQ, '0', t.ACCOUNTNO, t.OPPACCOUNTNO) as ACTDB, deCode(t.ACCOUNTSEQ, '1', t.ACCOUNTNO, t.OPPACCOUNTNO) as ACTCR, t.ACCOUNTMEMO, t.DATACD, t.ACTTITLEAPCODE, t.SEQNO, t.ACCEPTPAYTYPE, t.APNO, t.APSEQNO from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR# and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR# order by to_Number(t.SEQNO)

select t.RPTTYP, t.PAYCODE, t.ISSUYM, t.CHKDATE, deCode(t.ACCOUNTSEQ, '0', t.ACCOUNTNO, t.OPPACCOUNTNO) as ACTDB, deCode(t.ACCOUNTSEQ, '1', t.ACCOUNTNO, t.OPPACCOUNTNO) as ACTCR, t.ACCOUNTMEMO, t.DATACD, t.ACTTITLEAPCODE, t.SEQNO, t.ACCEPTPAYTYPE, t.APNO, t.APSEQNO from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR# and t.PAYTYP = #payTyp:VARCHAR# order by t.NLWKMK, t.ADWKMK, t.PAYTYP, t.ACCOUNTSEQ, to_Number(t.SEQNO)

select t.RPTTYP, t.PAYCODE, t.ISSUYM, t.CHKDATE, deCode(t.ACCOUNTSEQ, '0', t.ACCOUNTNO, t.OPPACCOUNTNO) as ACTDB, deCode(t.ACCOUNTSEQ, '1', t.ACCOUNTNO, t.OPPACCOUNTNO) as ACTCR, t.ACCOUNTMEMO, t.DATACD, t.ACTTITLEAPCODE, t.SEQNO, t.ACCEPTPAYTYPE, t.APNO, t.APSEQNO from BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and t.ACCOUNTTOPFMK = 'Y' and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR# order by t.NLWKMK, t.ADWKMK, t.PAYTYP, t.ACCOUNTSEQ, to_Number(t.SEQNO)
sqlMap.update: update BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

update BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

update BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t set t.RPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR#, t.PROCTIME = to_Char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') where t.RPTTYP = '18' and t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# and t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# and t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null and (t.RPTPAGE is null or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), ' ') = ' ' or NVL(trim(t.RPTPAGE), 0) = 0) and t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

UPDATE BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t SET t.ERPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR# WHERE t.RPTTYP = '18' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND t.CPRNDATE = #v_i_cprndt:VARCHAR# AND t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#
UPDATE BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t SET t.ACCOUNTMEMO = '' WHERE t.RPTTYP = '18' AND t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND t.APNO = #apNo:VARCHAR# AND t.ISSUTYP = 'E' AND t.ACCOUNTMEMO = 'N'

UPDATE BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t SET t.ERPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR# WHERE t.RPTTYP = '18' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND t.CPRNDATE = #v_i_cprndt:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null AND t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#

UPDATE BAPAYRPTACCOUNT t SET t.ERPTPAGE = #v_cprnpage:VARCHAR# WHERE t.RPTTYP = '18' AND t.ISSUYM = #issuYm:VARCHAR# AND t.PAYCODE = #payCode:VARCHAR# AND t.CHKDATE = #chkDate:VARCHAR# AND t.CPRNDATE = #v_i_cprndt:VARCHAR# and NVL(t.NLWKMK,' ') = NVL(#nlWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and NVL(t.ADWKMK,' ') = NVL(#adWkMk:VARCHAR#,' ') and t.NACHGMK is null AND t.ISSUTYP = #issuTyp:VARCHAR#
